generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks and white lane markings, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and pedestrian zones.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the street, including utility poles and possibly traffic light poles.
- vegetation: Trees can be seen in the distance along the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A few people can be seen standing or walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and one car is visible driving ahead.
- truck: A large white truck is parked on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the truck.
- bicycle: Bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
